content: My Python script keeps throwing a 'ModuleNotFoundError' when I try to import pandas
This error typically means pandas isn't installed in your environment. Let me help you troubleshoot this.
I thought I installed it. How can I check which packages are installed?
You can run 'pip list' in your terminal to see all installed packages. If pandas isn't listed, install it with 'pip install pandas'
Can you help me rewrite this email to sound more professional? I need to decline a meeting invitation politely
I'd be happy to help you rewrite the email. Please share the current draft and I'll make it more professional.
Here it is: 'Sorry can't make it Thursday. Contact me at sales.lead@example.com or call (555) 123-4567.
I have a question about billing for last month
I can help you with billing questions. What specific information do you need?
